response.original_title: Acheron's Pyramid / Lyre of the Priestess
response.overview: The latest video in Yoshi Sodeoka's ongoing psychedelic/ambient video project, Sibyl. The series was inspired in part by the spirit of 1970s progressive rock concept albums, ancient Greek mythology, and shamanic ritual.
response.title: Acheron's Pyramid / Lyre of the Priestess
